title: How Japan’s Leader, Sanae Takaichi, Rescued Her Party from the Abyss
summary_full: Sanae Takaichi, Japan’s first female prime minister, harnessed her personal popularity and a shift to the right among voters to achieve a record election win.
summary_public: Sanae Takaichi, Japan’s first female prime minister, harnessed her personal popularity and a shift to the right among voters to achieve a record election win.
